SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT a.CLNA_ID, a.CLNA_REQDATE, a.CLNA_REQAMOUNT, a.CLNA_CURRENCY, a.CLNA_URGENT, a.CLNA_TYPE, a.CLNA_AMOUNTAPPROVEDCLIMNGR, a.CLNA_AMOUNTAPPROVEDDEPTMNGR, a.CLNA_APPROVALDATECLIMNGR, a.CLNA_APPROVALDATEDEPTMNGR, a.CLNA_USRIDCLIMNGR, a.CLNA_USRIDDEPTMNGR, a.CLNA_BANKNAME, b.CODE_DESCRIPTION FROM :1/CLNA a left outer join :1/CODE b on b.CODE_TYPE = 331 and b.CODE_NUMBERN = a.CLNA_TYPE and CODE_LANGUAGE = ':2' where a.CLNA_ADMNO = :5 and a.CLNA_CLNTNO = :6 and CLNA_APPROVALDATEDEPTMNGR between ':3' and ':4' order by a.CLNA_APPROVALDATEDEPTMNGR, a.CLNA_APPROVALTIMEDEPTMNGR for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
